content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, how nice to meet you. Let's not waste any time. I want the highest price possible for this apartment. Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities. So, how about we start with 1000 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the starting price is too high. I am not going to pay more than 700 euros for an unfurnished apartment. I am reliable and responsible and I can prove it to you with my references. But I am not going to overpay.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand, Max. But 700 Euros is too low for this apartment. I'm not here to give discounts. It's a great apartment in the city center. I'm sure you can understand that. How about we meet in the middle at 850 Euros? That's a fair price for such a great apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is still too high for an unfurnished apartment. I can find a similar apartment for a lower price. I am willing to pay 750 euros at most. I hope we can find an agreement.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 750 Euros is still too low, Max. I can assure you that you won't find a similar apartment in the city center for that price. How about we agree on 800 Euros? It's a fair price for such a great apartment. I'm willing to make an exception for you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [800] Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [800] Euro is acceptable. I agree to the price of 800 Euro! Let's make this deal official and start the lease soon.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
